name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is a vintage oscilloscope-themed robot who has been a loyal member of the WebtrES club for decades. With its retro console box, soldier buttons, and soldier arms and legs, Retrotron holds an unmistakable charm. Though its screen may be broken, its functionality remains intact, making it a valuable asset to its owners. Retrotron's ability_scores range from 0 to 10, with its hp (Hit Points), charisma, constitution, dexterity, intelligence, strength, and wisdom all being fairly balanced. Its diverse set of abilities allows it to adapt and excel in various situations. As a member of the WebtrES club, Retrotron has honed its skills in web-based technologies, making it a proficient and knowledgeable companion. With its quirky and nostalgic aesthetics, Retrotron brings a touch of vintage charm to any environment. Its alignment is neutral, as it values both tradition and progress, and seeks to find a balance between the two.
